EmailTemplate.name: RFQ
EmailTemplate.subject: RFQ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WHITE INDUSTRIES Date:
ESTIMATING CHECKLIST Salesperson: Jim Stevenson RFQ Required By: Company Name (Capitals) Phone Fax Billing Address (Postal) (Capitals) Delivery Address (Capitals) Customer Contact - Not in Capitals Position Phone Fax Mobile Email address Size of the company (Number of Employees) How long have they been in business? How do they know about us? Potential to lead to more work? Other PRODUCT DETAILS Name (drawing number) (Capitals) Description (Capitals) Drawing available? Yes No Patterns available? Yes No Machine tooling available? Yes No Order qty Annual qty Metal/ material? Cast Nett Weight Do they have any problems with the design/part? Yes No Is it currently getting made? Yes No If so by whom Current price? (if applicable) Ball Park / Gut feel Price? Order Value / Annual Value Machining Required? Yes No Painted Yes No Feight - FIS FOT Testing / Certification Yes No What level of Cert Surface Finish requirments (greensand / Hardsand) Send quote direct to customer or back to sales person Direct Salesperson Other/ Notes:
